trans-unit.resname: F12·9 | Lingering Souls | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
trans-unit.target: 派出两个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: F12·9 | Lingering Souls | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 返照{1}{B}（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.resname: F12·11 | Pillar of Flame | Card Name
F12·11 | Pillar of Flame | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 2 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成2点伤害。如果本回合中曾以此法受到伤害的生物将死去，则改为将它放逐。
